Geographer Is Novain:
It is not difficult. You would still be doing it, farther out in search of the Delegation. Killing monsters of the Forgotten Plains, I collect 10 Pieces of the Order, which can be found in the Arachnid Embryo. Lately Embryo behave very suspiciously. I would like to know what they were up to.
I'm afraid Your Delegation also suffered from these creatures. But we can't know for sure. Need to conduct a study. Please help us. I, in turn, will also try to find out anything about Delegation.
